1.title: Planes Were Trains

episode of.title: What If by SnG Comedy (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: The 2nd Season of What If begins with us asking if Indian airplanes worked the same way as Indian railways do. This involves the chaos of overcrowding, bad food, noise, and corruption. Watch and thank god Air India is not Indian Railways (yet).

2.title: Jokes Were Food

episode of.title: What If by SnG Comedy (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: How would Indians react if Jokes were served like dishes in a restaurant? Our 2nd episode of What If Season 2 gives you a unique spin on the offended and free speech debate where we attempt to clear the air through dishes like Paneer Kapil Sharma and Edgy Omelette.

3.title: Yo Yo Honey Singh Was a Feminist

episode of.title: What If by SnG Comedy (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: The 3rd Episode of What If Season 2 takes on India's biggest viral hit maker- Yo Yo Honey Singh. But in Aadar's version of Brown Rang, we imagine him as the empowering feminist we would all wish him to be. This Honey Singh isn't scared of being a feminist, ready to empower the women in his life and never judging them by the colour of their skin or their clothes.

4.title: Shark Tank Was in India

episode of.title: What If by SnG Comedy (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: SnG Comedy wonders what if Shark Tank was in India. The hit U.S. series gets a desi twist as Indian businesspeople Chota Yadav, Vijay Vallya, Steven Badra and Ekta Kumar show you the bad, the worst and the ugly of Indian business practices.

1.title: Social Media in Real Life

episode of.title: What If by SnG Comedy (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Imagine Facebook coming and hitting on you in a bar? How would life be if everyone behaved like they do on Whatsapp groups? The first episode of our new comedy Web Series- 'What If" takes you through the funny and bizarre world of social media and messaging apps.

2.title: Match Fixing Was Cool

episode of.title: What If by SnG Comedy (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: What if Cricket matches could be fixed without any hesitation? What if Cricketers didn't make enough money and had to hunt for a day job? Let your imagination fly as we take you through India's favorite obsession.

3.title: Bollywood Had Logic

episode of.title: What If by SnG Comedy (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Bollywood movies are great without your brains. But what if you could add a bit of logic into them? What if a blank cheque to leave a rich father's daughter alone is actually accepted? What if you took your blind mother to the hospital first before asking God for a miracle?

4.title: Salman Did SRK Movies

episode of.title: What If by SnG Comedy (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: What if the reigning stars of Bollywood were to switch movies? How would some of our most favorite movies play out if Salman played the leading role in a SRK movies? Check out our take on an updated Devdas, DDLJ, Mohabbatein, Jab Tak Hain Jaan and others.

5.title: Call Centres Helped with Break Ups

episode of.title: What If by SnG Comedy (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Have you just had your heart broken and needed a sympathetic ear but no one around? What if there was a call centre dedicated to just listen to you sob? They will help you get over him/her after you wait 40 minutes to speak to the customer care guy.

6.title: Roles Were Reversed

episode of.title: What If by SnG Comedy (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: The gender rules are reversed. Imagine an actor being asked the same questions as an actress- What are you wearing? What kind of outfits did you have to wear for this film?

7.title: Teleshopping Sold Friends

episode of.title: What If by SnG Comedy (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Teleshopping has sold you on some of the most bizarre things- from Steam Sauna belts which make you lose weight to Magical Pendants. But what if they could sell you something useful which you can use even when you're not online like friends?

8.title: Bollywood Characters Were Tweaked

episode of.title: What If by SnG Comedy (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: Bollywood is a bit surreal to say the least. But What If some of the most iconic characters from it were tweaked? How different would the life of Sholay's Thakur be if he had hands? What if Aamir Khan's character in Ghajini was a waiter at your favorite restaurant? How would Shakespearean Gangs Of Wasseypur look?
